update.releaseNotes:
v3.4.2 - Changelog
New --- - Add new command, `attackback` that will press the "Attack" button and then press the "Back" button to advance to the next wave (useful for farming Fragments quickly from the Elemental Treasure Quests).
Changed --- - Optimize call to check for battle end during combat. - Fix nonexistent items in data.json by removing Aurora Fragment and Oblivion Fragment.
Fixed --- - Fix the fix previously implemented to handle comments in same string. - Fix general bypass on adjustments for image processing. - Add back missing code to facilitate item detection.
